entry.title: One beer with Arne Martin Aurlien
entry.summary: Mobile web developer, based in Trondheim, Norway, doing both front-end and back-end development. With a track record of somewhere among 400 and 500 tasted beer types just tasting became not enough and brewing became a hobby. He's now the proud keeper of the first price in last years Norwegian Christmas beer competition.

entry.title: One beer with Mark Boas
entry.summary: Web developer, enthusiastic for new and open web technologies and work for Happyworm Ltd which love most forms of audio and created jPlayer. Mark lives in a town called San Casciano In Val Di Pesa in the heart of wine growing country just outside Florence. Despite that he has a passion for good beer.
